overview:
Johnnie Walker is a Problem Solver, Visionary, Opportunity Seeker, and Thinker.

God given ideas used to help change and solve some of the worlds problems

Entrepreneurs are born; its a mindset. Imagination over intellect

Its about the execution and business model blue print; not the idea

Great Entrepreneurs have the ability to take a peek into the future for new ideas, glance at the past to learn from its mistakes and success, and then to finally and consciously bring them to the present to build…..

degrees.subject: Entreprenuership & Small Business Management Minor in PSY
